price: [Los ángeles] temen a su Señor que está por encima de ellos, y ejecutan todo cuanto se les ordena.
arabic: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ۩

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yakhāfūna rabbahum min fawqihim wayafʿalūna mā yu'marūna
